title: Today's NYT Mini Crossword Answers for Sunday, March 1
description: Here are the answers for The New York Times Mini Crossword for March 1.

Reader engagement service
Gaming content category

title: Our agreement with the Department of War
description: Details on OpenAI’s contract with the Department of War, outlining safety red lines, legal protections, and how AI systems will be deployed in classified environments.
summary_ko: OpenAI가 국방부와 체결한 계약의 세부사항을 공개했습니다. 안전 가이드라인, 법적 보호장치, 그리고 기밀 환경에서의 AI 시스템 배치 방식을 명시했습니다. AI 기술의 정부 부문 활용에 대한 투명성을 제공합니다.
summary_en: OpenAI disclosed details of its contract with the Department of War. The agreement outlines safety guidelines, legal protections, and AI system deployment in classified environments. It provides transparency regarding AI technology use in government sectors.
so_what_ko: 정부와의 AI 파트너십은 기업의 신뢰성을 높이고 B2G 시장 진입 기회를 제공할 수 있습니다.
so_what_en: Government AI partnerships can enhance corporate credibility and provide B2G market entry opportunities.
key_points: OpenAI-Department of War partnership
AI safety and legal frameworks
Classified environment AI deployment
Government sector AI adoption

title: How to Watch the 2026 MotoGP Season Live From Anywhere
description: Twenty-two riders from 11 teams are set to battle it out on two wheels for this year's championship.
summary_ko: 2026년 MotoGP 시즌을 전 세계 어디서든 시청할 수 있는 방법을 안내하는 기사입니다. 11개 팀의 22명 라이더들이 올해 챔피언십을 놓고 경쟁합니다. 스포츠 스트리밍 서비스 이용 가이드를 제공합니다.
summary_en: This article guides how to watch the 2026 MotoGP season live from anywhere in the world. Twenty-two riders from 11 teams will compete for this year's championship. It provides guidance on sports streaming services.
so_what_ko: 글로벌 콘텐츠 접근성은 D2C 브랜드의 국제적 고객 기반 확대에 중요한 인사이트를 제공합니다.
so_what_en: Global content accessibility provides important insights for D2C brands' international customer base expansion.
key_points: Global streaming accessibility
Sports content viewing guide
Cross-border content consumption

title: Mirakl turns profitable as recurring revenue and marketplace activity grows
description:
Mirakl said it achieved full-year profitability in 2025, marking a financial milestone as recurring revenue and marketplace activity increased across its platform. The Boston- and Paris-based commerce software provider reported annual recurring revenue of $218 million for the year, a 23% increase from 2024. Mirakl said marketplace and dropship activity processed through its platform totaled […]
The post Mirakl turns profitable as recurring revenue and marketplace activity grows appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
summary_ko: 마켓플레이스 소프트웨어 제공업체 미라클이 2025년 연간 수익성을 달성했다고 발표했습니다. 연간 반복 수익이 2억 1,800만 달러로 전년 대비 23% 증가했습니다. 플랫폼을 통한 마켓플레이스 및 드롭십 활동이 크게 증가한 것이 성장 동력이었습니다.
summary_en: Marketplace software provider Mirakl announced it achieved full-year profitability in 2025. Annual recurring revenue reached $218 million, representing a 23% increase from 2024. The growth was driven by significant increases in marketplace and dropship activity processed through its platform.
so_what_ko: 마켓플레이스 플랫폼의 지속적인 성장과 수익성 달성은 D2C 브랜드들이 멀티채널 전략에서 마켓플레이스 진출을 고려해야 함을 시사합니다.
so_what_en: The continued growth and profitability of marketplace platforms suggests D2C brands should consider marketplace expansion as part of their multi-channel strategies.
key_points: Mirakl achieved profitability with $218M ARR
23% year-over-year revenue growth
Increased marketplace and dropship activity
Financial milestone for commerce software provider

title: AI is rewiring how the world’s best Go players think
description: Burrowed in the alleys of Hongik-dong, a hushed residential neighborhood in eastern Seoul, is a faded stone-tiled building stamped “Korea Baduk Association,” the governing body for professional Go. The game is an ancient one, with sacred stature in South Korea.  But inside the building, rooms once filled with the soft clatter of hands dipping into…
summary_ko: AI가 세계 최고 바둑 선수들의 사고 방식을 변화시키고 있다는 내용의 기사입니다. 서울 홍익동에 위치한 한국기원에서의 바둑 문화와 AI의 영향을 다룹니다. 원문에서 구체적인 AI 기술이나 비즈니스 적용 사례는 확인되지 않음.
summary_en: The article discusses how AI is changing how the world's best Go players think. It covers Go culture at the Korea Baduk Association in Seoul's Hongik-dong neighborhood and AI's influence on the game. Specific AI technologies or business applications are not confirmed in the source excerpt.
so_what_ko: AI가 전통 게임 분야에서 인간의 사고를 변화시키고 있어, D2C 브랜드도 AI를 통한 고객 행동 분석과 전략 최적화를 고려해야 합니다.
so_what_en: AI's ability to transform human thinking in traditional games suggests D2C brands should explore AI for customer behavior analysis and strategy optimization.
key_points: AI transforming Go players' thinking
Traditional game meets modern technology
Focus on Korea Baduk Association

title: Trump orders federal agencies to drop Anthropic’s AI
description:
On Friday afternoon, Donald Trump posted on Truth Social, accusing Anthropic, the AI company behind Claude, of attempting to "STRONG-ARM" the Pentagon and directing federal agencies to "IMMEDIATELY CEASE" use of its products. At issue is Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei's refusal of an updated agreement with the US military agreeing to "any lawful use" of Anthropic's technology, as Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth mandated in a January memo, to the frustration of many tech workers across the industry.
As we explained earlier this week, that agreement would give the US military access to use the company's services for mass domestic surveillance and  …
Read the full story at The Verge.
summary_ko: 트럼프가 연방기관들에 앤트로픽의 AI 사용 중단을 명령했습니다. 앤트로픽 CEO가 미군과의 계약에서 '합법적 용도'라는 광범위한 조건에 동의를 거부한 것이 원인입니다. 이는 대량 감시와 자율 살상 무기 사용에 대한 우려 때문입니다.
summary_en: Trump ordered federal agencies to cease using Anthropic's AI products. The issue stems from Anthropic CEO's refusal to agree to updated military contract terms allowing 'any lawful use' of the technology. This relates to concerns about mass surveillance and autonomous lethal weapons applications.
so_what_ko: AI 기업의 윤리적 가이드라인과 정부 요구 사이의 갈등은 D2C 기업들이 AI 파트너 선택 시 공급업체의 윤리적 입장을 고려해야 함을 시사합니다.
so_what_en: The conflict between AI companies' ethical guidelines and government demands suggests D2C businesses should consider vendors' ethical positions when selecting AI partners.
key_points: Trump orders halt to Anthropic AI use
Anthropic refuses 'any lawful use' military terms
Concerns over mass surveillance applications
Ethical AI guardrails vs. government demands

title: AI vs. the Pentagon: killer robots, mass surveillance, and red lines
description:
WASHINGTON, DC - JANUARY 29: U.S. Secretary of War Pete Hegseth (C) speaks during a meeting of the Cabinet as U.S. President Donald Trump (L) and U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick (R) listen in the Cabinet Room of the White House on January 29, 2026 in Washington, DC. President Trump is holding the meeting as the Senate plans to hold a vote on a spending package to avoid another government shutdown, however Democrats are holding out for a deal to consider funding for the Department of Homeland Security.  (Photo by Win McNamee/Getty Images) | Getty Images	

Can AI firms set limits on how and where the military uses their models? Anthropic is in heated negotiations with the Pentagon after refusing to comply with new military contract terms that would require it to loosen the guardrails on its AI models, allowing for “any lawful use,” even mass surveillance of Americans and fully autonomous lethal weapons. 
Pentagon CTO Emil Michael is pushing for Anthropic to be designated a “supply
summary_ko: 앤트로픽이 미군과의 계약 조건 완화를 거부하며 펜타곤과 격렬한 협상을 벌이고 있습니다. 새로운 군사 계약 조건은 대량 감시와 완전 자율 살상 무기를 포함한 '합법적 용도' 허용을 요구합니다. AI 기업들이 군사 용도에 대한 한계를 설정할 수 있는지가 쟁점입니다.
summary_en: Anthropic is in heated negotiations with the Pentagon after refusing to comply with new military contract terms requiring loosened AI model guardrails. The new terms would allow 'any lawful use' including mass surveillance of Americans and fully autonomous lethal weapons. The key issue is whether AI firms can set limits on military use of their models.
so_what_ko: AI 기업과 정부 간 윤리적 갈등은 D2C 기업들이 AI 솔루션 도입 시 공급업체의 가치관과 정책적 리스크를 면밀히 검토해야 함을 보여줍니다.
so_what_en: The ethical conflict between AI companies and government highlights the need for D2C businesses to carefully evaluate vendors' values and policy risks when adopting AI solutions.
key_points: Anthropic refuses Pentagon's 'any lawful use' terms
Debate over AI firms setting military use limits
Concerns about mass surveillance and lethal weapons
Pentagon pushing for supply designation

title: We don’t have to have unsupervised killer robots
description:
It's the day of the Pentagon's looming ultimatum for Anthropic: allow the US military unchecked access to its technology, including for mass surveillance and fully autonomous lethal weapons, or potentially be designated a "supply chain risk" and potentially lose hundreds of billions of dollars in contracts. Amid the intensifying public statements and threats, tech workers across the industry are looking at their own companies' government and military contracts, wondering what kind of future they're helping to build. 
While the Department of Defense has spent weeks negotiating with Anthropic over removing its guardrails, including allowing t …
Read the full story at The Verge.
summary_ko: Anthropic이 미국 국방부의 AI 기술 접근 요구에 직면했습니다. 국방부는 대량 감시와 완전 자율 치명 무기 사용을 위한 제약 해제를 요구하고 있습니다. 기술 업계 직원들이 자신들의 회사가 구축하는 미래에 대해 우려를 표하고 있습니다.
summary_en: Anthropic faces the Pentagon's ultimatum for unchecked access to its AI technology. The Department of Defense demands removal of guardrails for mass surveillance and fully autonomous lethal weapons. Tech workers across the industry are questioning what kind of future their companies are helping to build.
so_what_ko: AI 기업들은 정부 계약과 윤리적 책임 사이에서 균형을 맞춰야 하며, 이는 브랜드 신뢰도와 직결됩니다.
so_what_en: AI companies must balance government contracts with ethical responsibilities, which directly impacts brand trust and consumer perception.
key_points: Anthropic faces Pentagon pressure to remove AI safety guardrails
Military seeks access for surveillance and autonomous weapons
Tech workers expressing concerns about ethical implications
Potential designation as 'supply chain risk' threatens contracts

title: The Galaxy S26 is a photography nightmare
description:
In many ways, Samsung's new phones are fairly normal upgrades. The S26 lines come with some useful new things - particularly the Privacy Display on the S26 Ultra, which looks like an extremely cool bit of tech and a really useful new feature - and a lot of iterative year-over-year changes. The new camera features, on the other hand, are neither of those things. They're something worse. Something scarier.

Verge subscribers, don't forget you get exclusive access to ad-free Vergecast wherever you get your podcasts. Head here. Not a subscriber? You can sign up here.
On this episode of The Vergecast, Nilay and David discuss the new phones,  …
Read the full story at The Verge.
summary_ko: 삼성의 갤럭시 S26 시리즈가 새로운 AI 카메라 기능을 탑재했습니다. S26 Ultra의 프라이버시 디스플레이는 유용한 신기술로 평가받고 있습니다. 그러나 새로운 카메라 기능들은 우려스러운 측면이 있다고 지적되고 있습니다.
summary_en: Samsung's Galaxy S26 series features new AI camera capabilities that are raising concerns. The S26 Ultra's Privacy Display is noted as useful new technology. However, the new camera features are described as problematic and concerning by reviewers.
so_what_ko: AI 카메라 기술의 발전이 사용자 경험과 프라이버시 우려 사이의 균형점을 찾아야 함을 시사합니다.
so_what_en: Advancement in AI camera technology highlights the need to balance enhanced user experience with privacy concerns.
key_points: Galaxy S26 series includes iterative upgrades and new AI camera features
Privacy Display on S26 Ultra receives positive reception
New camera capabilities raise concerning implications
Technology advancement creating mixed consumer reactions

title: How WPP aims to cut down agency complexity with its Elevate28 strategy
description: A cost-savings plan will impact jobs, but the agency network plans to reinvest in talent in areas like commerce, analytics and influencers, executives indicated.
summary_ko: WPP가 Elevate28 전략을 통해 에이전시 복잡성을 줄이려 하고 있습니다. 비용 절감 계획이 일자리에 영향을 미칠 예정입니다. 커머스, 애널리틱스, 인플루언서 분야의 인재에 재투자할 계획입니다.
summary_en: WPP aims to reduce agency complexity through its Elevate28 strategy. The cost-savings plan will impact jobs across the organization. The agency network plans to reinvest in talent areas like commerce, analytics and influencers.
so_what_ko: 대형 에이전시들이 효율성을 위해 구조조정하면서 특화 분야에 집중투자하는 트렌드를 보여줍니다.
so_what_en: Major agencies are restructuring for efficiency while focusing investments on specialized areas like commerce and analytics.
key_points: WPP implementing Elevate28 strategy to reduce complexity
Cost-savings plan will affect employment
Reinvestment planned in commerce and analytics talent
Focus on influencer marketing capabilities

title: Campaign Trail: Bosch builds cute robots to push windshield wiper innovation
description: Created with agency Bailey Lauerman, “Impressive Innovation” demonstrates how the company brings precision and performance to wipers and beyond.
summary_ko: 보쉬가 윈드실드 와이퍼 혁신을 홍보하기 위해 귀여운 로봇을 활용한 캠페인을 진행했습니다. Bailey Lauerman 에이전시와 협력하여 제작되었습니다. 'Impressive Innovation' 캠페인은 회사의 정밀성과 성능을 보여줍니다.
summary_en: Bosch created a campaign featuring cute robots to promote windshield wiper innovation. The campaign was developed with agency Bailey Lauerman. 'Impressive Innovation' demonstrates the company's precision and performance in wipers and beyond.
so_what_ko: 기술 제품도 감정적 연결을 통해 마케팅할 수 있으며, 로봇 캐릭터가 효과적인 브랜딩 도구가 될 수 있습니다.
so_what_en: Technical products can be marketed through emotional connections, with robot characters serving as effective branding tools.
key_points: Bosch uses cute robots in windshield wiper campaign
Partnership with Bailey Lauerman agency
Focus on precision and performance messaging
Creative approach to technical product marketing

title: How Progressive balances AI use with authenticity as scrutiny persists
description: The insurance provider’s “Drive Like an Animal” campaign leveraged AI to reduce production time while still considering consumer sentiment.
summary_ko: Progressive가 AI 활용과 진정성 사이의 균형을 맞추려 노력하고 있습니다. 'Drive Like an Animal' 캠페인에서 AI를 활용해 제작 시간을 단축했습니다. 소비자 감정을 고려하면서도 효율성을 추구했습니다.
summary_en: Progressive balances AI use with authenticity amid ongoing scrutiny. The 'Drive Like an Animal' campaign leveraged AI to reduce production time. The insurance provider considers consumer sentiment while utilizing AI efficiency.
so_what_ko: 브랜드들이 AI 기술의 효율성과 소비자가 원하는 진정성 사이에서 신중한 균형을 찾아야 합니다.
so_what_en: Brands must carefully balance AI technology efficiency with consumer demand for authenticity in their marketing efforts.
key_points: Progressive uses AI while maintaining brand authenticity
AI reduced production time in recent campaign
Company considers consumer sentiment in AI implementation
Balancing efficiency with authentic brand messaging

title: Joint Statement from OpenAI and Microsoft
description: Microsoft and OpenAI continue to work closely across research, engineering, and product development, building on years of deep collaboration and shared success.
summary_ko: OpenAI와 Microsoft가 연구, 엔지니어링, 제품 개발 분야에서 지속적인 협력을 발표했습니다. 양사는 수년간의 깊은 협력과 공동 성과를 바탕으로 파트너십을 강화하고 있습니다. 이번 공동 성명은 AI 기술 발전을 위한 두 회사의 지속적인 동맹을 확인했습니다.
summary_en: OpenAI and Microsoft announced their continued collaboration across research, engineering, and product development. The partnership builds on years of deep collaboration and shared success between the two companies. This joint statement confirms the ongoing alliance for AI technology advancement.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드는 OpenAI-Microsoft 협력을 통해 더욱 통합된 AI 솔루션을 활용할 수 있게 될 것입니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands can expect more integrated AI solutions through the OpenAI-Microsoft collaboration.
key_points: OpenAI와 Microsoft의 지속적인 파트너십 강화
연구, 엔지니어링, 제품 개발 분야 협력
수년간의 협력 기반 위에 구축된 관계

title: OpenAI and Amazon announce strategic partnership
description: OpenAI and Amazon announce a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI’s Frontier platform to AWS, expanding AI infrastructure, custom models, and enterprise AI agents.
summary_ko: OpenAI와 Amazon이 전략적 파트너십을 발표하며 OpenAI의 Frontier 플랫폼을 AWS에 도입합니다. 이 협력은 AI 인프라 확장, 커스텀 모델 개발, 기업용 AI 에이전트 제공을 포함합니다. 양사의 파트너십은 기업 고객을 위한 AI 서비스 접근성을 크게 향상시킬 것으로 예상됩니다.
summary_en: OpenAI and Amazon announced a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI's Frontier platform to AWS. The collaboration includes expanding AI infrastructure, developing custom models, and providing enterprise AI agents. This partnership is expected to significantly improve AI service accessibility for enterprise customers.
so_what_ko: D2C 기업들은 AWS를 통해 OpenAI의 고급 AI 기능을 더 쉽게 활용할 수 있어 맞춤형 AI 솔루션 구축이 가능해집니다.
so_what_en: D2C companies can more easily leverage OpenAI's advanced AI capabilities through AWS, enabling custom AI solution development.
key_points: OpenAI Frontier 플랫폼의 AWS 통합
AI 인프라 확장 및 커스텀 모델 개발
기업용 AI 에이전트 서비스 제공

title: Scaling AI for everyone
description: Today we’re announcing $110B in new investment at a $730B pre money valuation. This includes $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon.
summary_ko: OpenAI가 모든 사람을 위한 AI 확장을 목표로 1,100억 달러의 신규 투자를 발표했습니다. 투자 전 기업가치는 7,300억 달러로 평가되며, SoftBank 300억 달러, NVIDIA 300억 달러, Amazon 500억 달러가 포함됩니다. 이번 대규모 투자는 AI 기술의 대중화와 접근성 향상을 목표로 합니다.
summary_en: OpenAI announced $110 billion in new investment aimed at scaling AI for everyone. The company is valued at $730 billion pre-money, with investments including $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon. This massive investment aims to democratize AI technology and improve accessibility.
so_what_ko: 대규모 투자로 인한 AI 기술의 대중화는 D2C 브랜드들이 더 저렴하고 접근 가능한 AI 솔루션을 활용할 수 있는 기회를 제공합니다.
so_what_en: The democratization of AI through massive investment provides opportunities for D2C brands to leverage more affordable and accessible AI solutions.
key_points: 1,100억 달러 신규 투자 유치
기업가치 7,300억 달러로 평가
주요 투자자: SoftBank, NVIDIA, Amazon

title: Introducing the Stateful Runtime Environment for Agents in Amazon Bedrock
description: Stateful Runtime for Agents in Amazon Bedrock brings persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI.
summary_ko: Amazon Bedrock에서 AI 에이전트를 위한 상태 유지 런타임 환경이 도입되었습니다. 이 기술은 OpenAI로 구동되는 다단계 AI 워크플로우에 지속적인 오케스트레이션, 메모리, 보안 실행 기능을 제공합니다. 상태 유지 기능을 통해 AI 에이전트가 더 복잡하고 연속적인 작업을 수행할 수 있게 됩니다.
summary_en: Amazon Bedrock introduces a Stateful Runtime Environment for AI agents. This technology provides persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI. The stateful functionality enables AI agents to perform more complex and continuous tasks.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드는 상태 유지 AI 에이전트를 활용하여 고객 여정 전반에 걸친 일관되고 개인화된 서비스를 제공할 수 있습니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands can leverage stateful AI agents to provide consistent and personalized services throughout the customer journey.
key_points: Amazon Bedrock 상태 유지 런타임 환경 출시
지속적인 메모리와 보안 실행 기능
OpenAI 기반 다단계 AI 워크플로우 지원

title: AI is moving faster than customer trust
description:
Marketers are racing ahead with AI, but unless brands close the trust gap, customers may never fully embrace AI-powered engagement.
The post AI is moving faster than customer trust appeared first on MarTech.
summary_ko: 마케터들이 AI를 빠르게 도입하고 있지만 고객 신뢰는 그 속도를 따라가지 못하고 있습니다. 브랜드가 신뢰 격차를 해소하지 못하면 고객들이 AI 기반 참여를 완전히 수용하지 않을 수 있습니다. AI 기술의 발전 속도와 고객 수용 속도 간의 불균형이 마케팅 효과에 영향을 미칠 수 있습니다.
summary_en: Marketers are rapidly adopting AI, but customer trust is not keeping pace with this speed. Unless brands close the trust gap, customers may never fully embrace AI-powered engagement. The imbalance between AI advancement speed and customer acceptance could impact marketing effectiveness.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드는 AI 기술 도입과 함께 고객 신뢰 구축을 위한 투명한 커뮤니케이션과 점진적 접근 전략이 필요합니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands need transparent communication and gradual implementation strategies to build customer trust alongside AI technology adoption.
key_points: 마케터의 AI 도입과 고객 신뢰 간 격차
AI 기반 고객 참여의 완전한 수용 저해 우려
신뢰 격차가 마케팅 효과에 미치는 영향

title: Mobile marketing with RCS: What you need to know
description:
RCS is a game changer for mobile marketing. Updated with news that Apple and Google are testing cross-platform RCS encryption.
The post Mobile marketing with RCS: What you need to know appeared first on MarTech.
summary_ko: RCS(Rich Communication Services)는 모바일 마케팅의 게임체인저로 부상하고 있습니다. Apple과 Google이 크로스 플랫폼 RCS 암호화를 테스트 중이라는 소식이 전해졌습니다. 기존 SMS 대비 풍부한 미디어 경험과 향상된 보안성을 제공합니다.
summary_en: RCS (Rich Communication Services) is emerging as a game changer for mobile marketing. Apple and Google are testing cross-platform RCS encryption according to recent news. It offers richer media experiences and enhanced security compared to traditional SMS.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드들은 RCS를 활용해 고객과의 상호작용을 강화하고 개인화된 마케팅 메시지를 전달할 수 있는 기회를 모색해야 합니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands should explore RCS opportunities to enhance customer interactions and deliver personalized marketing messages with richer media capabilities.
key_points: RCS provides enhanced mobile messaging capabilities beyond traditional SMS
Apple and Google are working on cross-platform encryption for RCS
Offers new opportunities for interactive and media-rich marketing campaigns

title: What gets B2B brands cited in genAI answers
description:
A study of 1,000+ prompts across four AI engines reveals what drives B2B brand visibility in generative AI answers — and where common GEO advice falls short.
The post What gets B2B brands cited in genAI answers appeared first on MarTech.
summary_ko: 1,000개 이상의 프롬프트를 분석한 연구에서 B2B 브랜드가 생성형 AI 답변에 인용되는 요인이 밝혀졌습니다. 네 개의 AI 엔진을 대상으로 한 분석 결과 기존 GEO 조언의 한계도 드러났습니다. B2B 브랜드의 AI 가시성 확보를 위한 새로운 전략이 필요함을 시사합니다.
summary_en: A study analyzing 1,000+ prompts revealed factors that drive B2B brand citations in generative AI answers. The analysis across four AI engines exposed limitations of common GEO advice. It suggests new strategies are needed for B2B brands to achieve AI visibility.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드들은 생성형 AI에서의 가시성 확보를 위해 기존 SEO 전략을 넘어선 새로운 콘텐츠 최적화 방안을 개발해야 합니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands need to develop new content optimization strategies beyond traditional SEO to secure visibility in generative AI platforms.
key_points: Study analyzed 1,000+ prompts across four AI engines
Reveals what drives B2B brand visibility in genAI answers
Common GEO advice shows limitations in AI citation strategies
New approaches needed for brand visibility in AI-generated content

title: How to architect AI agents in your martech stack
description:
AI agents introduce probabilistic decision-making into deterministic stacks. Define intent, enforce guardrails and architect agents that scale.
The post How to architect AI agents in your martech stack appeared first on MarTech.
summary_ko: AI 에이전트는 결정론적 마케팅 기술 스택에 확률적 의사결정을 도입합니다. 성공적인 구현을 위해서는 명확한 의도 정의, 가드레일 강화, 확장 가능한 아키텍처 설계가 필요합니다. 마케팅 기술 스택에서 AI 에이전트의 체계적 접근법이 중요합니다.
summary_en: AI agents introduce probabilistic decision-making into deterministic marketing technology stacks. Successful implementation requires defining clear intent, enforcing guardrails, and architecting agents that can scale. A systematic approach to AI agents in martech stacks is crucial.
so_what_ko: D2C 기업은 AI 에이전트 도입 시 기존 마케팅 시스템과의 통합성을 고려하고 명확한 가이드라인을 설정해야 합니다.
so_what_en: D2C companies must consider integration with existing marketing systems and establish clear guidelines when implementing AI agents.
key_points: AI agents bring probabilistic decision-making to deterministic systems
Requires clear intent definition and guardrail enforcement
Focus on scalable architecture design
Systematic approach needed for martech stack integration

title: How to tell if your CDP is really real-time
description:
Every vendor says they do real-time updates; here's a real-world method to distinguish between platforms. 
The post How to tell if your CDP is really real-time appeared first on MarTech.
summary_ko: 모든 벤더가 실시간 업데이트를 제공한다고 주장하지만 실제 성능은 다릅니다. CDP(Customer Data Platform)의 실시간 성능을 평가하는 실용적인 방법이 제시되었습니다. 플랫폼 간 실질적인 차이를 구별하는 현실적 검증 방법이 필요합니다.
summary_en: Every vendor claims to provide real-time updates, but actual performance varies significantly. A practical method for evaluating real-time CDP performance has been presented. Real-world verification methods are needed to distinguish between platforms.
so_what_ko: D2C 브랜드는 CDP 선택 시 벤더의 실시간 처리 주장을 검증할 수 있는 구체적인 평가 기준을 적용해야 합니다.
so_what_en: D2C brands should apply specific evaluation criteria to verify vendor claims about real-time processing capabilities when selecting CDPs.
key_points: Vendor claims about real-time capabilities often don't match reality
Real-world testing methods help distinguish between platforms
Practical evaluation approach for CDP real-time performance
Need for concrete verification criteria beyond marketing claims

title: Ticker: CNN’s First of All Celebrates 100 Episodes, CNBC Layoffs
description: Layoffs hit CNBC as fewer than a dozen positions have been eliminated as part of an editorial overhaul.
summary_ko: CNN의 'First of All'이 100번째 에피소드를 축하했습니다. CNBC에서는 편집 개편의 일환으로 12명 미만의 직원이 해고되었습니다. 미디어 업계의 구조조정이 지속되고 있음을 보여줍니다.
summary_en: CNN's 'First of All' celebrated its 100th episode milestone. CNBC laid off fewer than a dozen positions as part of an editorial overhaul. This reflects ongoing restructuring in the media industry.
so_what_ko: 미디어 업계의 변화는 D2C 브랜드의 광고 및 콘텐츠 파트너십 전략에 영향을 미칠 수 있으므로 다각화된 미디어 접근이 필요합니다.
so_what_en: Media industry changes may impact D2C brands' advertising and content partnership strategies, requiring diversified media approaches.
key_points: CNN's 'First of All' reaches 100 episodes
CNBC eliminates fewer than dozen positions
Part of broader editorial restructuring efforts
Reflects ongoing media industry transformation

title: With Netflix Out, Paramount and WBD Could Reshape TV Advertising
description: Paramount and Warner Bros. Discovery are poised to shake up the ad industry, but not without clearing some hurdles.
summary_ko: 넷플릭스가 빠진 상황에서 파라마운트와 워너브로스 디스커버리가 TV 광고 업계를 재편할 준비를 하고 있습니다. 두 회사의 합병으로 광고 업계에 새로운 협상력과 AI 기반 광고 솔루션이 등장할 것으로 예상됩니다. 하지만 이러한 변화를 위해서는 여러 규제적 허들을 넘어야 하는 상황입니다.
summary_en: Paramount and Warner Bros. Discovery are positioned to reshape the TV advertising industry as Netflix exits the space. The merger is expected to bring enhanced negotiating power and AI-driven advertising solutions to the market. However, the companies must overcome several regulatory hurdles to achieve this transformation.
so_what_ko: 대형 미디어 기업들의 합병으로 TV 광고 시장의 AI 기반 솔루션이 확산될 것으로 보이며, D2C 브랜드들은 이러한 플랫폼을 활용한 타겟팅 전략을 준비해야 합니다.
so_what_en: The merger of major media companies will accelerate AI-driven advertising solutions in TV, requiring D2C brands to prepare targeted strategies leveraging these new platforms.
key_points: Paramount and WBD merger reshaping TV advertising landscape
Enhanced AI-driven advertising capabilities expected
Netflix's exit creates new opportunities for competitors
Regulatory hurdles remain before transformation

title: What’s CNN’s Future Under Paramount Skydance?
description: CNN staffers are reportedly apprehensive following the news that they will be part of Paramount Skydance.
summary_ko: CNN 직원들이 파라마운트 스카이댄스 합병 소식 이후 불안감을 보이고 있다고 보도되었습니다. 새로운 소유주 하에서 CNN의 미래 방향성에 대한 우려가 커지고 있습니다. 미디어 업계의 대규모 합병이 뉴스 조직에 미칠 영향에 대한 관심이 높아지고 있습니다.
summary_en: CNN staff members are reportedly showing apprehension following news of the Paramount Skydance merger. Concerns are growing about CNN's future direction under new ownership. The impact of major media mergers on news organizations is drawing increased attention in the industry.
so_what_ko: 미디어 합병으로 인한 콘텐츠 전략 변화가 예상되므로, D2C 브랜드들은 뉴스 미디어 파트너십과 광고 전략을 재검토해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Expected content strategy changes from media mergers require D2C brands to reassess news media partnerships and advertising strategies.
key_points: CNN staff expressing concerns about Paramount Skydance merger
Uncertainty about future direction under new ownership
Media consolidation impacting news organizations
Industry transformation affecting content strategies

title: Why Adidas Originals Brought Samuel L. Jackson and His Superstars Back for Chapter Two
description: Marketing boss Annie Barrett wants to build on the 'halo' effect from Jackson's first ads.
summary_ko: 아디다스 오리지널스가 사무엘 L. 잭슨과 슈퍼스타 신발을 다시 등장시키며 2장을 시작했습니다. 마케팅 책임자 애니 바렛은 잭슨의 첫 번째 광고에서 나타난 '후광 효과'를 더욱 발전시키고자 한다고 밝혔습니다. 이는 브랜드의 연속성 있는 스토리텔링 전략의 일환으로 보입니다.
summary_en: Adidas Originals brought back Samuel L. Jackson and his Superstars for Chapter Two of their campaign. Marketing boss Annie Barrett aims to build on the 'halo effect' from Jackson's first advertisements. This represents a strategic continuation of the brand's storytelling approach.
so_what_ko: 유명인을 활용한 연속성 있는 캠페인 전략이 브랜드 인지도와 후광 효과를 극대화할 수 있으며, D2C 브랜드들도 장기적인 스토리텔링 전략을 고려해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Continuous celebrity campaigns can maximize brand recognition and halo effects, suggesting D2C brands should consider long-term storytelling strategies.
key_points: Adidas Originals continues Samuel L. Jackson campaign
Building on 'halo effect' from previous advertisements
Strategic brand storytelling continuation
Celebrity endorsement campaign expansion

title: Saucony’s 4-Minute Ad Celebrates the Community in Solo Running
description: The campaign pushes for emotion over performance.
summary_ko: 사우코니가 개인 러닝에서의 커뮤니티를 기념하는 4분짜리 광고를 선보였습니다. 이 캠페인은 성과보다는 감정에 중점을 두는 접근법을 취하고 있습니다. 혼자 달리는 러너들 사이의 공동체 의식을 강조하는 독특한 마케팅 전략을 보여줍니다.
summary_en: Saucony released a 4-minute advertisement celebrating the community aspect within solo running. The campaign emphasizes emotion over performance in its approach. It showcases a unique marketing strategy highlighting community spirit among individual runners.
so_what_ko: 감정적 연결과 커뮤니티 가치를 강조하는 마케팅이 성과 중심 메시지보다 더 깊은 브랜드 연결을 만들 수 있으며, D2C 브랜드들은 고객의 정서적 니즈에 집중해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Emotion-focused marketing emphasizing community values can create deeper brand connections than performance-driven messages, requiring D2C brands to focus on customers' emotional needs.
key_points: 4-minute Saucony ad celebrates solo running community
Emotion-over-performance marketing approach
Community spirit in individual activities
Extended-format advertising content

title: METR’s Joel Becker on exponential Time Horizon Evals, Threat Models, and the Limits of AI Productivity
description: AIE Europe CFP and AIE World’s Fair paper submissions for CAIS peer review are due TODAY - do not delay!
summary_ko: METR의 조엘 베커가 지수적 시간 지평선 평가, 위협 모델, AI 생산성의 한계에 대해 논의했습니다. AIE 유럽 CFP와 AIE 월드 페어 논문 제출 마감이 당일까지였다고 언급되었습니다. AI 안전성과 평가 방법론에 대한 전문적 논의가 진행되었습니다.
summary_en: METR's Joel Becker discussed exponential time horizon evaluations, threat models, and the limits of AI productivity. The article mentions that AIE Europe CFP and AIE World's Fair paper submissions for CAIS peer review were due that day. Professional discussions on AI safety and evaluation methodologies were conducted.
so_what_ko: AI의 생산성 한계와 위험 평가 방법론을 이해하는 것이 D2C 비즈니스의 AI 도입 전략 수립에 중요한 고려사항이 될 것입니다.
so_what_en: Understanding AI productivity limits and risk assessment methodologies will be crucial considerations for D2C businesses developing AI adoption strategies.
key_points: Discussion on AI productivity limitations
Exponential time horizon evaluation methods
AI threat models and safety considerations
Academic paper submissions for AI safety research
